description: Unique identifier for a procedure record for a person.
comment: Primary Key for the PROCEDURE_OCCURRENCE table.

description: Unique identifier for the person associated with the procedure.
Standard concept mapped from the source value representing a procedure.
Start datetime of the procedure. If the procedure has a time, use this field.
End date of the procedure. Defaults to the same date as procedure_date if not provided.
End datetime of the procedure. Used to determine procedure duration.
Concept ID representing the provenance of the procedure record (e.g., EHR, claims).
Concept ID representing modifiers providing additional information about the procedure.
Quantity of procedures performed. Defaults to 1 if omitted in the source data.
Identifier for the provider associated with the procedure.
The visit during which the procedure occurred.
The VISIT_DETAIL record during which the procedure occurred.
Verbatim value from the source data representing the procedure.
Concept ID representing the procedure source value, not necessarily standard.
Verbatim value from the source data representing the modifier code for the procedure.
